vsParam:
Comfreys and Rose Petals...
The neutralizer that Bergamot Sensei is preparing...

All the ingredients to make "Aroma of Cure"
seem to be ready! So... Nelke!

... Yes, Master Peppermint!
Finally... it's time to synthesize.

Trust yourself, Nelke——!
You can do it, Nelke!

Hehe, I'll pray for you too~!
God will bless you!

We can only pray for you...
But Lady Nelke, you can do it!

They've said what I want to say...
Nelke, just give it a try!

(Relax. This time, you'll gain something
 whether you succeed or not.)

The point is not to leave any regrets.
... So, just give it a try!
So... I, Nelke von Lestamm, will start now!!
Try your best, try your best!

Oh, got it, got it.
Hey—— Nelke~!

Hold on, I told you not to call me master anymore!
I'm so sorry that I lied...

No, you didn't lie to me.
Thanks to the alchemy dojo, I've learned so much.

Yeah, sure.
Alchemy is inseparable from various kinds of attachment.

The attachment of ingredients and the synthesized items.
The attachment of alchemists and their guards.
And the attachment of the makers and users.

They're all "complementary".
They're all connected by various kinds of attachment——

My alchemy didn't work in this world, but I've made friends with
many people through it and developed a lot of attachment.
I think I've developed a bit of attachment through alchemy——

That's how I see it.
I owe it to Master and [px].

Hmm—— Really?
I'm so glad to hear that...

Truth to be told... I'm so anxious when I first came to this world.
I was so afraid that Westbald could never develop well...

But I've been to so many places with all of you.
Also, I've learned alchemy and discussed stuff with you...

I want to master more knowledge in this world,
after which I'll use it on the development of my village!

So, Master Peppermint, [px].
Please keep enlightening me!

We need to gather various orcs today!
Maybe they'll be a bit heavy. Let's go!

No, we can't let Lady Nelke carry heavy stuff.
Let me carry her bag...!

Oh, sorry, you two.
I made an appointment with people to go gathering...

Hehe, it seems so.
Have a safe trip, Nelke!

Got it! So...
I'm going to take off, master!

To learn from Nelke! The alchemy dojo!!
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　-The End-
